# DaVinci Resolve Keyboard Shortcuts

## Page Navigation
| Shortcut | Action |
|----------|--------|
| Shift+2 | Media Page |
| Shift+3 | Cut Page |
| Shift+4 | Edit Page |
| Shift+5 | Fusion Page |
| Shift+6 | Color Page |
| Shift+7 | Fairlight Page |
| Shift+8 | Deliver Page |

## Playback
| Shortcut | Action |
|----------|--------|
| Space | Play/Stop |
| L | Play Forward |
| J | Play Reverse |
| K | Stop |
| . | Step Forward 1 Frame |
| , | Step Back 1 Frame |
| Shift+. | Step Forward 1 Second |
| Shift+, | Step Back 1 Second |
| Home | Go to Start |
| End | Go to End |
| Up Arrow | Previous Edit |
| Down Arrow | Next Edit |

## Timeline
| Shortcut | Action |
|----------|--------|
| I | Mark In |
| O | Mark Out |
| X | Mark Clip |
| Alt+X | Clear In/Out |
| Q | Toggle Source/Timeline |
| Cmd+= | Zoom In Timeline |
| Cmd+- | Zoom Out Timeline |
| Shift+Z | Fit Timeline to Window |
| Cmd+Shift+A | Deselect All |
| Cmd+A | Select All |

## Editing
| Shortcut | Action |
|----------|--------|
| V | Selection Mode |
| T | Trim Mode |
| B | Blade Tool |
| Cmd+B | Blade at Playhead |
| Cmd+\ | Blade All Tracks |
| Delete | Ripple Delete |
| Backspace | Delete (Leave Gap) |
| Cmd+Z | Undo |
| Cmd+Shift+Z | Redo |
| Cmd+C | Copy |
| Cmd+V | Paste |
| Alt+V | Paste Insert |
| Cmd+X | Cut |

## Clips
| Shortcut | Action |
|----------|--------|
| R | Speed Change |
| Cmd+R | Reverse Clip |
| Cmd+G | Create Compound Clip |
| Alt+G | Decompose Compound |
| D | Disable/Enable Clip |
| L | Link Audio/Video |
| Cmd+L | Lock Track |
| Alt+Click | Select Single Track |

## Markers
| Shortcut | Action |
|----------|--------|
| M | Add Marker |
| Shift+Up | Previous Marker |
| Shift+Down | Next Marker |
| Alt+M | Delete Marker |
| Cmd+M | Modify Marker |

## Color Page
| Shortcut | Action |
|----------|--------|
| Alt+S | Add Node |
| Alt+P | Add Parallel Node |
| Alt+L | Add Layer Node |
| Shift+S | Add Serial Node |
| Cmd+D | Disable Node |
| = | Next Node |
| - | Previous Node |
| Shift+H | Highlight |
| Cmd+Home | Reset All Grades |
| Alt+G | Grab Still |
| Cmd+Alt+G | Apply Grade |

## Fusion Page
| Shortcut | Action |
|----------|--------|
| Shift+Space | Add Tool |
| F | Fit to View |
| 1/2 | View Left/Right |
| Ctrl+T | Add Transform |
| Ctrl+M | Add Merge |
| . | Render |
| Ctrl+P | Enable Proxy |

## Audio (Fairlight)
| Shortcut | Action |
|----------|--------|
| Alt+A | Automation Mode |
| Cmd+Shift+M | Mute All |
| Cmd+Shift+S | Solo None |
| N | Normalize |
| Cmd+Alt+L | Link Group |

## Deliver Page
| Shortcut | Action |
|----------|--------|
| Cmd+Shift+R | Add to Render Queue |
| Cmd+R | Start Render |

## View
| Shortcut | Action |
|----------|--------|
| Cmd+F | Full Screen |
| P | Cinema Viewer |
| Alt+F | Full Screen Viewer |
| Cmd+Shift+F | Full Screen Timeline |
| Shift+` | Toggle Dual Screen |
| Ctrl+~ | Full Inspector |

## Project
| Shortcut | Action |
|----------|--------|
| Cmd+S | Save Project |
| Cmd+Shift+S | Save Project As |
| Cmd+Z | Undo |
| Cmd+Shift+Z | Redo |
| Cmd+I | Import Media |
| Cmd+E | Quick Export |

## Tips
- Hold **Alt** while dragging to duplicate clips
- Hold **Cmd** to snap to markers and edit points
- Double-click node to rename in Fusion
- Right-click for context menus everywhere
- Hover over any control for tooltip with shortcut
